mapper.update: update qna set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents} where num = #{num}
mapper.select:
select count(num) from qna where
title writer contents
like concat('%',#{search},'%') order by num desc
mapper.insert: insert into qna (num, title, writer, contents, regDate, hit, ref, step, depth) values (#{num}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{contents}, sysdate(), 0, 0,0,0);
insert into qnaFiles (num, fileName, oriName) values(#{num}, #{fileName}, #{oriName})
mapper.update: update qna set ref=#{num} where num=#{num}
